mapper.select: SELECT * FROM holopay_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY hp_history_id

SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(HP1, 0)), 0) + NVL(SUM(NVL(HP4, 0)), 0) - (NVL(SUM(NVL(HP2, 0)), 0) + NVL(SUM(NVL(HP3, 0)), 0)) AS 잔액 FROM ( SELECT hp_type, price, member_id FROM holopay_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) PIVOT ( SUM(price) FOR hp_type IN ('HP1' AS HP1, 'HP2' AS HP2, 'HP3' AS HP3, 'HP4' AS HP4))
SELECT * FROM holopay_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND HP_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{searchMonth}) ORDER BY hp_date

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT hp_history_id, member_id, hp_date, hp_type, price, holopay_comment, trade_id, member_finance_id, add_payresult_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY hp_date) AS rnum FROM holopay_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND HP_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{searchMonth}) ) tmp WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY hp_date
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM holopay_history WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND HP_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{searchMonth})
